profileAlternative.name: Trevor Rempel
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist - Point72
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a data scientist working on alternative data in the financial industry. This includes ingestion, cleaning, and modelling of large datasets as well as extensive experience in web scraping.
I hold a PhD in theoretical physics from the Perimeter Institute for Theoretical Physics/University of Waterloo.

aboutAlternative.text:
I am a data scientist working on alternative data in the financial industry. This includes ingestion, cleaning, and modelling of large datasets as well as extensive experience in web scraping.
I hold a PhD in theoretical physics from the Perimeter Institute for Theoretical Physics/University of Waterloo.

items: Action and Vertices in the Worldline Formalism
Scalar Field Theory in a Curved Momentum Space
Test Particle Transport: Higher order correlations and time dependent diffusion
The Implicit Function Theorem in a non-Archimedean Setting
Classical Spinning Particle - A Universal Model
